attributes.action: support The Institute of Occupational Safety & Health’s campaign for improved heath and safety teaching in the classroom and make it a mandatory subject of every curriculum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the UK over the last ten years, 66 under 19s were killed at work and over
14,500 suffered major injuries. Almost 52,000 other teenagers were hurt whilst in work. These deaths and injuries can be prevented.	

Furthermore the government should signal the importance of health and safety when setting its strategic priorities for education, training and skills.
